name: BlinkID - ID card and passport scanner
description: BlinkID uses a mobile camera to capture data from ID cards, passports, drivers licenses, visas, work permits, and other identity documents in just a few seconds.  BlinkID supports a majority of EU country documents, as well as all documents containing MRZ (Machine Readable Zone) or the PDF417 barcode, including drivers licenses in all states in the US, Canada, and certain countries in Latin America. For some countries and documents, complete data extraction is available for both the front and back side of the document.  Features:  Real-time data extraction  High accuracy   150+ countries supported  Front and back side data capture and comparison  Image extraction of the face, document, and signature photo  A new, fast, and robust card detector  Compatible with all verification and biometric solutions   BlinkID app is a demo for Microblinks technology and BlinkID product. If you are interested in integrating BlinkID into your solution, try out our mobile SDK or WEB API for free on our site: https://microblink.com/products/blinkid/mobile-sdk  Microblink Ltd. is an R&D company with a mission to simplify data entry in mobile and web apps using camera input. Our proprietary computer vision technology extracts data from identity documents, receipts, top-ups, payment slips, boarding passes, and many other. Find out more on our website: https://microblink.com/
